resources.string: What ends up happening is that lack of planning leads to lots of bumps and complications which in turn end up destroying their momentum and costing them lots of time and resources. In my experience, it seems that one of the top reasons mobile apps fail is poor planning and lack of strategy. The recurring theme throughout this article is the following
